```{r}
library(ggmsa)
library(Biostrings)
library(svglite)
```


```{r}
flg22_alg <- readAAMultipleAlignment("../input/flg22 variants show in bubble plot.fasta", 'fasta')
mycustom <- as.data.frame(read.csv("../input/custom_color.csv"))
 ggmsa(flg22_alg, 1, 22, seq_name = TRUE, char_width = 0.7,custom_color = mycustom,  font = "helvetical") + geom_seqlogo(custom_color = mycustom)
 ggsave(filename = "../output/flg22_alg.pdf", width = 7, height = 4)
 ggsave(filename = "../output/flg22_alg.svg", width = 7, height = 4)
```
